alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 1:08PM MST until September 13 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 200 PM MST. * At 108 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Tombstone, or 24 miles southeast of Benson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tombstone, Pearce-Sunsites, Elfrida, and Sunizona. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
